headline.main: Senate Asks Former Trump Adviser to Retain Russia Material
headline.print_headline: Senate Asks Former Trump Adviser to Retain Russia Material

lead_paragraph: A former foreign policy adviser to President Donald Trump's campaign says he has been contacted by the Senate intelligence Committee about its investigation into Russia's involvement in the 2016 election.
snippet: A former foreign policy adviser to President Donald Trump's campaign says he has been contacted by the Senate intelligence Committee about its investigation into Russia's involvement in the 2016 election....
